description: RIA-3827 Request response review for out of country appeal

replacements.sendDirectionExplanation:
The Home Office has replied to your Appeal Skeleton Argument and evidence. You should review their response.

# Next steps

Review the Home Office response. If you want to respond to what they have said, you should email the Tribunal.

If you do not respond by the date indicated below, the case will automatically go to hearing.
